name: Great Panther Mining Limited
description: Great Panther Mining Limited is a publicly traded precious metals mining and exploration company based in Canada. Founded in 1965, the company is focused on the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in the Americas. Great Panther operates several mines in Mexico, including the Guanajuato Mine Complex and the Topia Mine, and is actively engaged in the development of its flagship project, the Tucano Gold Mine located in Brazil. The company’s strategy emphasizes sustainable mining practices and responsible resource management, aiming to minimize environmental impact while maximizing shareholder value. Great Panther is committed to social responsibility, working closely with local communities and stakeholders to foster positive relationships and support economic development in the regions where it operates. With a portfolio that includes both silver and gold production, the company is well-positioned to benefit from fluctuations in precious metals prices and is actively exploring opportunities to expand its resource base through exploration and acquisition initiatives. Great Panther strives to maintain high operational standards and has implemented robust safety protocols to ensure the well-being of its workforce.
